subText: It celebrates “moments of legacy, love, and the power of community voices.”
Mookie Betts and Dearica Hamby, professional basketball players and their families.

text: What do you understand about hard work from the video?
subText: Hard work is the central theme in the video. Two successful athletes share a story about hard work in the book “AJ and the Comeback Kid.” They show how hard work is the single important ingredient to put in before playing to ensure success.

text: How does Michael Jordan and his featured athletes use privilege for the common good?
subText: “Sneakers bring you to us, and community is why you stay” is the powerful mantra of Air Jordan, the sneakers sold under the Jordan Brand. The sales from this initiative go directly towards the common good by supporting kids who love basketball. The brand also supports family athletes like Mookie Betts and Dearica Hamby with professional expertise.

text: How do you feel watching this video as a kid?
